about_the_game:
Forge your cosmic fortress in this intense real-time strategy game! As humanity's last hope, construct and defend your base against relentless alien hordes.

Strategic Base Building

Design and expand your interstellar stronghold

Resource Management

Balance defense and technological advancement

Diverse Alien Threats

Combat unique enemy types with varied abilities

Advanced Weaponry

Research and deploy cutting-edge cosmic defenses

Dynamic Combat

Adapt your strategy as battles unfold in real-time

Challenging Campaigns

Test your skills across the galaxy

Survival Mode

How long can you withstand the extraterrestrial siege?

Build. Defend. Survive.

Can you outmaneuver the alien invaders and secure humanity's future among the stars? Your base is the final frontier. Construct, battle, and thrive in STARGEARS!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 and 64 bits)
  • Processor: INTEL, AMD 2 cores CPU at 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000, Radeon, Nvidia card with shader model 3, 1GB video ram.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 and 64 bits)
  • Processor: INTEL, AMD 2 cores CPU at 2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 7950 or above, Nvidia GTX 670 or above. 4GB video ram.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
